title: pAhi shaurE
sahitya:
pAhi shaurE patagAdhipa vAhana mrdu pATala pAda sarOruha padmanAbha


anupallavi

  mOhana tanuruci jitakAma su-lalAma ripubhIma 
bhrtakAma murashAsana paTutama ratha caraNa dharaNa


caraNam 1    sArasAkSa sari dIsha shayamala maNi bhUSaNa bhUSita pAlita sAmajEndra
shArada vidhu mukhAmala vESa dhUtadOSa gata rOSAmara pOSa jagadIshvara 
mrgamada pari lasita niTila kundadyuti mrdu manda smita kruvinda prabharada
    caraNam 2    dEvadEva ditijALi nishUdana muni mAnasa vAriruhAlaya dInabandhO 
pAvanatara guNa gaNa vAsa mrduhAsa nija dashadhi nirAsa para puruSa viracaya 
shubha tatimayi mama jambha pramathana Dambha prashamana shambhu pravinuta   
    caraNam 3    vAsudEva vanadAma virajita karuNArasa sAgara pANDava vandyapAda bhAsita 
gAngEyOpama cEla dhrta shaila sukapOlAkhi mUla bhava mOcana jaladhara samaruci
vilasita bhUman vihara nikAmam mama hrdi bhO manju nayana
